title: any graphics artists around here that feel like earning some quick cash?
body:
i have a really old logo in a pretty crappy resolution, i need someone to rebuild it in super high definition, and give me a pretty big PNG and a vector image of it.

will pay, just let me know how much it costs, and link some images you worked on before, so i can gauge your skill.

replies.body:
I'll do it for $19.99 plus shipping and handling

Some pieces I have made before:
http://i.imgur.com/Tqrd66Z.png

Just kidding I can't draw
ill do it for free, for practice. honestly.

> [{quoted}](name=Silencega,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=oIzZ8U9i,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-03T22:09:48.118+0000)
>
> ill do it for free, for practice. honestly.

sure why not, does this link work? my net is freaking out at the moment.

http://imgur.com/a/LWCDF

the thing is i need it to come out perfect, i plan on using it for some marketing material and it really needs to come out great, i need it vectorized, and in super high def.

the red background fading to black line needs to go, need just the crown.

> [{quoted}](name=vampirekid13,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=oIzZ8U9i,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-03T22:21:07.017+0000)
>
> sure why not, does this link work? my net is freaking out at the moment.
> 
> http://imgur.com/a/LWCDF
> 
> the thing is i need it to come out perfect, i plan on using it for some marketing material and it really needs to come out great, i need it vectorized, and in super high def.
> 
> the red background fading to black line needs to go, need just the crown.

yeah no problem, it may take a while, but i can def do it, when you say high res though, how high do you need it?

> [{quoted}](name=Silencega,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=oIzZ8U9i,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-04T00:08:20.899+0000)
>
> yeah no problem, it may take a while, but i can def do it, when you say high res though, how high do you need it?

about 1900x1900, i dont know if its a perfect square or not, but width wise about 1900 pixels.

i imagine once you have the 1900 px wide version done making it a vector image shouldnt be too hard, but i dont know, its more than i know how to do using photoshop.
